Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Rate: Rate your experience on scale from 1 to 5 where 1 is awful and 5 is excellent:
Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Send:Good: That's really nice to hear! If you have any suggestions please write them down or press /cancel to skip this step
Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Send:Bad: Could you write down what I can do better or write points how can I improve myself? If you want to skip this step press /cancel
Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Send:NotDefined: Oh, I can't understand this rate. Try again or press /cancel to finish
Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Send:Empty: Please write down your ideas, I can't understand any other format. Or click /cancel to skip this step
Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Error: Hmm, I'm sorry but something went not as expected. Click /feedback again to restart
Texts.Pipelines:Feedback:Thanks: Thank you for your time and your feedback!
